MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the control and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> class. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> in an unusable state. After calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> was occupying. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> object's `Finalize` method.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. The `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with `disposing` set to `true`. The <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When `disposing` is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> references. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

block.para:
When overriding , because the method can be called multiple times by other objects, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to the method. For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)
[Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))
